name: untilyouaresonude
text:
My comment here was going to be "who could devote this much time to talking about Burger King?" However, I took a hard look at exactly what I was doing at this exact moment, and I got really sad for a second.

In all of our defenses, however, this IS more engrossing than the Burger King Menu.

Back me up, anyone.

name: trollcollins
text:
You know, this particular strip is actually pretty tragic and depressing.

Little Nephew is clearly delusional. He is not ruining nerds' lives. Their lives are already ruined; he's just playing in the wreckage. He's just all adolescent bluster and stupidity.

And of course, the passive-aggressive rod-up-their-ass weirdly-obsessive-about-a-particular-aspect-of-cultural-minutiae nerd just has the most pointless asocial existence.

It's like Myspace VS Wikipedia. Nobody wins.

name: mulisha7
text: So which is more pathetic? The minutiae-obsessed losers who populate boards like that or the assholes who thinks it makes them cool to pick on the losers?

name: autrepoupee
text: A comment left by autrepoupee was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by all-star951, Njury, Satyr)

name: heccibiggs
text:
They're really just insecure.

Seriously, this is like the biggest lie ever told to children. Bullies aren't insecure. They're just kids who realised they could make other kids laugh by being mean to certain weaker kids, and had no scruples about doing so.

Bullies aren't insecure. Bullies are just plain old regular bastards.

name: heccibiggs
text:
When I was like twelve I'd go into chatrooms and bait people into attempting to "cyber" with me by saying I was hot and secksy and eighteen, then when someone opened up a private chat with me and started trying to e-get it on, I'd go "SICKO I'M TWELVE YEARS OLD!!!!!"

Man what the fuck was wrong with me.

good shit, LN. good shit.

name: sp1derbaby
text: How do you know that a clown's ass is bad?

name: cagliostro
text:
WHY FIND OUT

Also, desert_donkey, I think the point is more that this isn't good shit. LN is really not very good at trolling at all (certainly not ruinous). He just picks chatrooms run by mods who are so tragically neurotic that you can piss them off by saying anything other than 'Burger King is IMHO the best place to eat food :-D'.

Whereas Vlad, who haf only basic experience, actually managed to set up an entire white supremacist forum on Pat's sandwich-shop message board, and has forgotten more about trolling than LN will ever know.

If this is in fact what you meant, and you were being ironic, I apologise for the clownishness of my ass, and will gladly fall on my own lame button.
